b'Hidan no Aria: Butei ga Kitarite Onsen: b'The story takes place in Tokyo Butei High School, a special school where armed detectives\xe2\x80\x94"Butei"\xe2\x80\x94are trained to use weapons. Kinji Tooyama is a second-year-student who has a special ability, but he keeps it a secret to maintain an ordinary, peaceful life; however, when he gets caught in a bombing on the way to school, he encounters H. Aria Kanzaki, the most powerful S-Rank Butei student in Assault Studies.\n\n(Source: ANN)'
